languages.text: "Утрата значительная, но восполнимая. Гибель самого пустотного корабля — вот истинное горе для Империума. Священный храм Омниссии отныне стал пустой скорлупой, и машинные духи покинули его".

"The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."
languages.original_text: "Утрата значительная, но восполнимая. Гибель самого пустотного корабля — вот истинное горе для Империума. Священный храм Омниссии отныне стал пустой скорлупой, и машинные духи покинули его".

traits.locale_text: "The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."

"The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."

"The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."

languages.text: “损失巨大，但很容易弥补。对帝国而言，那艘虚空舰的殒灭才是真正的悲剧。欧姆尼塞亚的圣殿如今已经变成了空壳，机魂已经抛弃了它。”
languages.original_text: "The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."

traits.locale_text: “损失巨大，但很容易弥补。对帝国而言，那艘虚空舰的殒灭才是真正的悲剧。欧姆尼塞亚的圣殿如今已经变成了空壳，机魂已经抛弃了它。”

languages.text: « La perte de la planète n'est pas négligeable, mais peut être aisément rectifiée. La perte du vaisseau spatial, en revanche, est bien plus grave pour l'Imperium. Le temple sacré de l'Omnimessie n'est plus qu'une coquille vide, abandonnée par les esprits de la machine. »
languages.original_text: "The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."

traits.locale_text: « La perte de la planète n'est pas négligeable, mais peut être aisément rectifiée. La perte du vaisseau spatial, en revanche, est bien plus grave pour l'Imperium. Le temple sacré de l'Omnimessie n'est plus qu'une coquille vide, abandonnée par les esprits de la machine. »

languages.text: «Es una pérdida significativa, pero fácilmente rectificable, mientras que la muerte de la nave del vacío en sí es una tragedia para el Imperium. El sagrado templo del Omnissiah no es más que un cascarón vacío, abandonado por todos sus espíritus máquina».
languages.original_text: "The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."

traits.locale_text: «Es una pérdida significativa, pero fácilmente rectificable, mientras que la muerte de la nave del vacío en sí es una tragedia para el Imperium. El sagrado templo del Omnissiah no es más que un cascarón vacío, abandonado por todos sus espíritus máquina».

languages.text: 「損失は重大だが、復旧はたやすい。ヴォイドシップそのものが壊れたことが帝国にとって真の不幸。万機神の聖なる神殿はもはや抜け殻であり、機械精霊に見放されたのだ」
languages.original_text: "The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."

traits.locale_text: 「損失は重大だが、復旧はたやすい。ヴォイドシップそのものが壊れたことが帝国にとって真の不幸。万機神の聖なる神殿はもはや抜け殻であり、機械精霊に見放されたのだ」

languages.text: "Der Verlust ist erheblich, lässt sich aber mühelos ausgleichen. Der Niedergang des Raumschiffs selbst ist der wahre Verlust für das Imperium. Der heilige Tempel des Omnissiah ist nun eine leere Hülle, und die Maschinengeister haben ihn aufgegeben."
languages.original_text: "The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."

traits.locale_text: "Der Verlust ist erheblich, lässt sich aber mühelos ausgleichen. Der Niedergang des Raumschiffs selbst ist der wahre Verlust für das Imperium. Der heilige Tempel des Omnissiah ist nun eine leere Hülle, und die Maschinengeister haben ihn aufgegeben."

languages.original_text: "The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."

languages.text: "Önemli ancak kolayca telafi edilebilecek bir kayıp. Bizzat uçsuz gemisinin yitişi, İmparatorluk için gerçekten tasa kaynağı. Hermesih'in kutsal tapınağı, içi boş bir kabuğa döndü. Makine ruhları orayı terk etti."
languages.original_text: "The loss is significant but easily rectified. The demise of the voidship itself is a true sorrow for the Imperium. The sacred temple of the Omnissiah is now an empty shell, and the machine spirits have forsaken it."

traits.locale_text: "Önemli ancak kolayca telafi edilebilecek bir kayıp. Bizzat uçsuz gemisinin yitişi, İmparatorluk için gerçekten tasa kaynağı. Hermesih'in kutsal tapınağı, içi boş bir kabuğa döndü. Makine ruhları orayı terk etti."
